TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewComboBoxColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn

summary.span: 代表 物件的資料行。

span.span: Represents a column of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是特殊的類型的用於邏輯主應用程式的資料格，讓使用者從選項清單中選取值。The class is a specialized type of used to logically host cells that enable users to select values from a list of choices. A都具有相關聯中每個，與交集。A has an associated in every that intersects it. 您可以手動填入儲存格，藉由設定其屬性。You can populate the cells manually by setting their properties. 或者，將資料行繫結至資料來源所指示屬性。Alternatively, you can bind the column to the data source indicated by the property. 如果是繫結至資料庫資料表，請將資料行屬性資料表中的資料行的名稱。If the is bound to a database table, set the column property to the name of a column in the table. 如果是繫結至物件的集合，請將物件屬性名稱的屬性。If the is bound to a collection of objects, set the property to the name of an object property. 您可以手動填入資料行的下拉式清單，藉由加入至值集合。You can populate the column drop-down list manually by adding values to the collection. 或者，您可以繫結下拉式清單至它自己的資料來源將資料行設定屬性。Alternatively, you can bind the drop-down list to its own data source by setting the column property. 如果值為集合中的物件或資料庫資料表中的記錄時，您也必須設定和屬性。If the values are objects in a collection or records in a database table, you must also set the and properties. 屬性會指出哪個物件屬性或資料庫資料行提供下拉式清單中顯示的值。The property indicates which object property or database column provides the values that are displayed in the drop-down list. 屬性會指出哪一個物件的屬性或資料庫資料行用來設定的儲存格屬性。The property indicates which object property or database column is used to set the cell property. 一個典型的案例是將繫結控制項加入父資料庫資料表，並繫結相關的子系資料表下拉式清單。One typical scenario is to bind the control to a parent database table and bind the drop-down list to a related child table. 例如，您可能會繫結控制權傳輸至`Orders`資料表，其中包含`ProductID`資料行和資料行集屬性`Products`資料表，其中包含`ProductID`和`ProductName`資料行。For example, you might bind the control to an `Orders` table that contains a `ProductID` column and set the column property to a `Products` table that contains `ProductID` and `ProductName` columns. 在此情況下，您可以將資料行屬性，以 「 ProductID 」 擴展其儲存格的值從`Orders.ProductID`資料行。In this case, you would set the column property to "ProductID" to populate its cell values from the `Orders.ProductID` column. 不過，若要顯示實際的產品名稱的資料格和下拉式清單中，您可以對應至這些值`Products`藉由設定資料表「 ProductID 」 的屬性和"ProductName"的屬性。However, to display the actual product names in the cells and the drop-down list, you would map these values to the `Products` table by setting the property to "ProductID" and the property to "ProductName". 下拉式清單值 (或值所指示屬性) 必須包含實際的資料格的值或控制項將會擲回例外狀況。The drop-down list values (or the values indicated by the property) must include the actual cell values or the control will throw an exception. 設定資料行， ，和屬性會自動設定所有資料格的對應屬性中資料行包括。Setting the column , , and properties automatically sets the corresponding properties of all cells in the column including the . 若要覆寫特定資料格的這些屬性值，設定資料行屬性第一次，然後再設定的資料格屬性。To override these property values for specific cells, set the column property first, and then set the cell properties. 不同於控制項，沒有和屬性。Unlike the control, the does not have and properties. 相反地，從下拉式清單中選取值，設定儲存格屬性。Instead, selecting a value from a drop-down list sets the cell property. 此資料行類型的預設排序模式是。The default sort mode for this column type is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以協助輸入資料到`TitleOfCourtesy`資料行。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#0)]

span.para: 當您衍生自並將新屬性加入衍生的類別，請務必覆寫方法，以便於複製作業期間複製新屬性。您也應該呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的內容複製到新的儲存格。

When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations. You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cells in the column will match the characters being entered in the cell with one from the possible selections.

value.span: 如果已啟動自動完成，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if auto completion is activated; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定資料行中每個資料格的屬性。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column. 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

summary.span: 取得或設定用來建立儲存格的樣板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to create cells.

value.span: ，做為資料欄中所有其他儲存格的模型。

span.span: A that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
The default value is a new .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式類別初始化這個屬性，以新建。The constructor for the class initializes this property to a newly created . > [!CAUTION] > 變更儲存格範本的內容不會立即影響資料行的現有儲存格的使用者介面 (UI)。Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells. 重新產生資料行後，才明顯這些變更 (例如，則資料行排序或透過呼叫方法)。These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the method). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，這是類似於這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 處理 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#120)]

An that represents the cloned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要複製的資料格的資料行使用這個方法。Use this method to duplicate a column of cells.

summary.span: 取得或設定可填入下拉式方塊選擇的資料來源。

span.span: Gets or sets the data source that populates the selections for the combo boxes.
An object that represents a data source.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 或屬性指定要擷取顯示下拉式方塊的下拉式清單中的選取項目資料的位置。The or properties specify where to retrieve the selection data shown in the combo box drop-down list. 當使用屬性，如果必須繪製資料，從非預設屬性或資料行，然後在屬性必須設定為非預設屬性或資料行的名稱。When using the property, if the data must be drawn from a nondefault property or column, then the property must be set to the name of the nondefault property or column. 如果屬性設為字串陣列，則和不需要設定，因為陣列中的每個字串將可用值和顯示。If the property is set to a string array, then and do not need to be set because each string in the array will be used for both value and display. 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以協助輸入資料到`TitleOfCourtesy`資料行。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. 屬性用來填入下拉式方塊選取項目。The property is used to populate the combo box with a selection of titles. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，此字串指定要從中擷取字串來顯示於下拉式方塊中的屬性或資料行。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies the property or column from which to retrieve strings for display in the combo boxes.

value.span: ，指定在 屬性中指定的資料來源內的屬性或資料行的名稱。

span.span: A that specifies the name of a property or column in the data source specified in the property.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 儲存的資料行中值的資料物件取自。The data for the values stored in a column of objects is obtained from the . 如果此資料來自非預設屬性或資料行，然後在屬性必須設定為必要的屬性名稱或資料行名稱。If this data comes from a nondefault property or column, then the property must be set to the necessary property name or column name. 如果看不到使用者的內部值的資料格值，然後使用和來將內部的資料格的值對應到使用者可檢視的值。If the cell values are internal values not visible to the user, then use and to map the internal cell values to user-viewable values. 當屬性設定為字串陣列，屬性不需要設定，因為將使用陣列中的每個字串，作為有效的顯示字串，以及有效的基礎值。When the property is set to a string array, the property does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and as a valid underlying value. 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用協助標題資料行的資料輸入。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in data entry of the title column. 設定為負責包含使用者可檢視的文字的屬性名稱。 is set to the property name responsible for containing the user-viewable text. 在此範例中，設定相同的值為因為不不需要任何對應。In this example, the is set to the same value as because no mapping is necessary. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#40)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值可判斷當不進行編輯時，要如何顯示此下拉式方塊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how the combo box is displayed when not editing.

value.span: 值，表示下拉式方塊的外觀。

span.span: A value indicating the combo box appearance.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會影響資料行中的儲存格的外觀時，它們不是處於編輯模式，不論它們是否為唯讀。The property affects the appearance of cells in the column when they are not in edit mode, and regardless of whether they are read-only. 儲存格處於編輯模式，它一律會看起來像控制項。When a cell is in edit mode, it always looks like a control. 如果屬性值是`false`、屬性會影響所有資料格資料行，否則屬性會影響目前儲存格。If the property value is `false`, the property affects all cells in the column; otherwise, the property affects only the current cell. 行為和外觀的儲存格的下拉式箭號會以屬性。The behavior and appearance of the drop-down arrow in the cells is indicated by the property. 若要啟用滑鼠指標在儲存格上方時，反白顯示資料格，您必須設定屬性和屬性。To enable cell highlighting when the mouse pointer is over a cell, you must set the property to and the property to . 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

span.span: The value of the property is .

span.span: if the display style applies only to the current cell; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性值是`false`、屬性會影響所有資料格資料行，否則屬性會影響目前儲存格。If the property value is `false`, the property affects all cells in the column; otherwise, the property affects only the current cell. 屬性會影響資料行中的儲存格的外觀時，它們不是處於編輯模式，不論它們是否為唯讀。The property affects the appearance of cells in the column when they are not in edit mode, and regardless of whether they are read-only. 儲存格處於編輯模式，它一律會看起來像控制項。When a cell is in edit mode, it always looks like a control. 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會對應至屬性成員。This property corresponds to the property of the member. 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定資料行中每個資料格的屬性。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column. 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以協助輸入資料到`TitleOfCourtesy`資料行。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. summary.span: 取得或設定資料行的儲存格之平面樣式外觀。

span.span: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the column's cells.
A value indicating the cell appearance.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會影響的行為和外觀的下拉式箭號，針對這個資料行中的資料格。The property affects the behavior and appearance of the drop-down arrows for the cells in this column. 從.NET Framework 4.6 中，當屬性設定為`Flat`或`Popup`下拉箭號會調整的大小根據系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目：Starting with the .NET Framework 4.6, when the property is set to `Flat` or `Popup` the drop-down arrows are resized according to the system DPI settings when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` 若要啟用滑鼠指標在儲存格上方時，反白顯示資料格，您必須設定屬性和屬性。To enable cell highlighting when the mouse pointer is over a cell, you must set the property to and the property to . 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以協助輸入資料到`TitleOfCourtesy`資料行。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 請參閱如需有關使用其關聯性。See for more information about its relationship with . 當屬性設定為字串陣列，屬性不需要設定，因為將使用陣列中的每個字串，作為有效的顯示字串，以及有效的基礎值。When the property is set to a string array, the property does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and as a valid underlying value. 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以協助輸入資料到`TitleOfCourtesy`資料行。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to aid in entering data into the `TitleOfCourtesy` column. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic.
